property.name: Rules
property.value: Double Breaker (This creature breaks 2 shields.), Draconic Roar -- Whenever this creature attacks, reveal the top card of your deck. If it's a non-evolution Dragon, put it into the battle zone. Otherwise, put it on the bottom of your deck.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Double Breaker (This creature breaks 2 shields.), Slayer (When this creature loses a battle, banish the other creature.), Acidic Breath -- When this creature enters the battle zone, choose one of your opponent's shields for each Dragon you have in the battle zone. This creature breaks those shields.
